title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.94 - Albion correctional facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.94 - Albion correctional facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as Albion Correctional Facility, which shall be located
in Albion, Orleans County, New York, and which shall consist of the property
under the jurisdiction of the department at that location. (b) Albion Correctional Facility shall be a
facility for females 18 years of age or older. (c) Albion Correctional Facility shall be
classified as a medium security correctional facility to be used for the
following functions: (1)
general confinement
facility; (2)
work release
facility; (3)
residential treatment
facility; and
(4)
alcohol and
substance treatment correctional annex. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
100.94

Amended

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
